name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A short film reflecting the current situation of unfinished buildings in China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Unexpected awakening"
Because some representatives this year proposed a proposal to ban games, some young people suddenly realized that they had never actually voted, and who elected these representatives.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @coreywoo192187 Oh? How does that compare to this?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Correction: The actual location and time of the incident was March 5, Minzhu 1st Street, Jianghan District, Wuhan, Hubei.
Beijing released the IP for the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing releases IP for video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 6, all Women's Day slogans in Chongqing Longhu Paradise Walk were removed and replaced with commercial advertisements.
The mall security guard revealed that it was because someone complained about the "inappropriate use of words".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @AQUILIFER_Zjj Let me say it again, the rights of women and sexual minorities are also what I advocate for.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, various videos of "removing Nongfu Spring from the shelves" have begun to appear on Douyin

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @IloveDavidMBuss @AQUILIFER_Zjj Suggest learning Chinese well and looking up the usage of "也"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@pWX3jhA7WDyY8bf @AQUILIFER_Zjj Yes, but if the words seeking equality and respect on these slogans are all understood as striving for privileges and appealing to ordinary men, then I can only say that it is a pity.
Mutual understanding and respect start from this moment. And the fact that women dare to show their demands to the society under high pressure during the two sessions is exactly what we men should learn.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 7, some netizens filmed thick smoke coming out of the Jiangsu Provincial Public Security Department building. Many netizens posted videos and pictures on the Internet, but the videos and pictures were quickly removed and the topic of "Jiangsu Provincial Public Security Department on fire" was banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/XQrSdyDLRY

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of March 7, an explosion occurred in the government building in Zhangjiagang, Jiangsu.
The pictures from the scene showed that the glass and door frames at the entrance of the building were seriously damaged.
A single page signed by "Yuan Jianhong" at 6:44 am on March 7, which was circulated online, showed that "I blew up the Zhangjiagang Municipal Government. I demand that corrupt officials be punished and that my factory, private house and other unequal treatment be returned to me. I am waiting to surrender."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another photo showed a gas tank that had been deformed by the explosion at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 7, Wang Yi asked four questions about the United States when answering questions from Chinese and foreign reporters. However, only 13 of the nearly 1,500 comments below the relevant news were displayed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/646nehkH4w

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of March 7, 2024, the owners of Yongji Zhuangyuanfu Community in Zhanhe District, Pingdingshan City, Henan Province, protested against the government's inaction, problems with regulatory funds, and the unfinished houses for more than 10 years. The rights protection has not achieved any results, and the government is shirking responsibility. During this period, the staff of Zhanhe District came, and some people knelt down to beg them to resume work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a public document from 2014, Yuan Jianhong, who claimed to be the perpetrator of the explosion at the Zhangjiagang Municipal Government Building, is the legal representative of "Zhangjiagang Hesheng CNC Machine Tool Manufacturing Co., Ltd.". As of February 2024, Qichacha showed that the legal representative of the company was Yuan Linfei.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of March 7, a fire broke out in Building No. 3 of Zhuozhou City Hospital. The fire on the exterior of the building has been extinguished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 6, a man posted a video saying that he found a porcelain brace in the lunch box he ordered from the canteen of Jiangsu Provincial People's Hospital. In response, the canteen staff said that the leadership was handling the matter, that there were surveillance cameras in the canteen, and that they were tracing the source.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/7lHt053jmA

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Hema Fresh employee revealed that in order to reduce costs, the Hema Fresh store in Wuhan did not bear the social security and provident fund of employees, and forced regular employees to become third-party employees. Employees were transferred to stores more than ten kilometers away from their homes to work. 
In response, employees in Shanghai, Xi'an, Shenzhen and other places also left messages saying that they had encountered the same situation. Some people also said that Chengdu had started a strike.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the same time, it is currently reported online that Hema Fresh stores across the country are closing down.
On March 6, Hema Fresh's official response stated that due to the expiration of the property contract and the downturn in some shopping malls, Hema Fresh will normally replace its last stores in the first half of this year, closing 6-7 stores nationwide and looking for better properties nearby to meet consumer demand. Currently, more than 360 stores are operating normally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 7 (Released) Ruzhou, Henan. Meilu Tianxia City has delayed the handover of houses and the resumption of construction for two years, and the developer has not shown up, so the owners have gathered together to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 6, workers from China Railway No. 4 Engineering Group Co., Ltd. of the Xintang High-speed Railway Station project of the Guangshen Railway in Zengcheng District, Guangzhou demanded their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 6, the owners of Donghaiwanmendi in Fengze District, Quanzhou City, Fujian Province went to the municipal government to defend their rights, protesting that the sales office of the community, which was only 15 meters away from the residential building, had been converted into a nuclear medicine medical testing center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the discussion between the owners of the community, the representatives of Panorama and the director of the local Health Commission, the project was brought in by the government in 23 years. The project was implemented without the consent of local residents, and the test report showed that the project had no other impact on the thousands of people in the Mendi community (as shown in the picture). At present, all the relevant information such as Douyin, public accounts, and messages sent by the owners have been deleted, and there is no way to expose it. 
Quanzhou Panorama Clinical Diagnostic Center Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Panorama") is registered at Building 18, Phase II, Donghai Bay View, at the intersection of Dongmei Road and Fenghai Road, Fengze District, Quanzhou City, Fujian Province. The nuclear medicine department of this project is located on the underground floor of the building. On the west side of the underground floor, a PET/CT and a PTE/MR machine room and supporting rooms are added, and a set of 3-level trough radioactive waste liquid decay pool is designed and used on the southwest side of the same floor. 1. According to the "Radiation Protection and Safety Requirements for Nuclear Medicine" (HJ 1188-2021) 5...
fullContent:
据小区业主和全景代表以及当地卫健委主任开会讨论得知，该项目是政府23年招商进来的，该项目并未获得当地居民的同意就落地了，而且检测报告显示，该项目对门第小区几千人影响外并无其他影响（如图），目前业主们发抖音，公众号，留言等相关信息全部被删除，曝光无门。  
泉州全景临床诊断中心有限公司（以下简称“全景”）注册地位于福建省泉州市丰泽区东梅路与丰海路交叉口东海湾景第二期18栋。该项目核医学科位于该楼的地下一层在地下一层西侧新增1台PET/CT和1台PTE/MR等机房及以配套用房，并在同层西南侧设计使用1套3级槽式放射性废液衰变池。  1.根据《核医学辐射防护与安全要求》（HJ 1188—2021）5.1.2 核医学工作场所不宜毗邻产科、儿科、食堂等部门及人员密集区，并应与非放射性工作场所有明确的分界隔离。 全景与门第居民楼路面距离不足15米，且共用一个地下室。  2.根据《核医学辐射防护与安全要求》（HJ 1188—2021）5.1.3 核医学工作场所排风口的位置尽可能远离周边高层建筑。 门第居民楼高三十几层，全景楼高5层，楼间距不足15米。  3.根据《核医学辐射防护与安全要求》（HJ 1188—2021）5.2.1 核医学工作场所应合理布局，住院治疗场所和门诊诊断场所应相对分开布置。 全景该项目不设病房，无法做到住院治疗场所和门诊诊断场所分开布置。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 6 (Released) Lanzhou, Gansu. Zhongcan Shiguanli Apartment was left unfinished, and the owners gathered together to defend their rights. The person who took the video said, "The developer did not provide a solution, there was no accurate information, and the police did not allow us to write banners."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 4, the Wuhan Metal Materials Circulation Association issued a risk warning, saying that since August last year, Sichuan, Jiangsu, Guizhou and other places have successively experienced "explosions", and a large number of steel trading companies have entered the bankruptcy liquidation stage.
On March 6, the Nanjing Steel Trade Chamber of Commerce issued a risk warning letter, hoping that all companies will adjust their mentality and not take risks.
On March 7, the Yunnan Iron and Steel Association issued a reminder that Yunnan steel companies are in a serious loss situation and will jointly reduce production by 500,000 tons
